decks.notes: This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays with Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer, supported by burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment. The deck also includes control elements like Static Prison and Thraben Charm to disrupt opponents' strategies. The inclusion of Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury adds a powerful late-game threat. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provides support and buffs to the team, while the land base enables consistent mana fixing. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of fast creatures and burn spells.

The deck focuses on aggressive creatures with disruptive abilities, aiming to control the board and apply constant pressure on the opponent. It utilizes cards like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize to remove threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Cards like Flickerwisp and Ephemerate provide value by blinking creatures for additional effects. With a mix of early game disruption and powerful creatures, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. By combining aggressive and disruptive elements, the deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent to secure victory.

The focus of this Jeskai Control deck is to control the game through a combination of powerful spells and creature abilities. With a mix of counter spells, removal, and card draw, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while setting up its own win conditions. The inclusion of powerful planeswalkers like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and strong creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, provides additional versatility and threats. The mana base allows for consistency in casting spells while the mix of instants, sorceries, and creatures gives the deck multiple ways to outmaneuver the opponent.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with creatures, then casting Living End to bring them all back onto the battlefield, overwhelming the opponent with a powerful board presence. The deck also includes cards to control the opponent's board and disrupt their strategy, allowing the combo to go off uninterrupted. The key strategy is to efficiently cycle through the deck, set up the graveyard, and then cast Living End to swing the game in your favor.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and using Leyline cards to boost their power. Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu are key threats, while Scion of Draco provides a strong late-game option. Stubborn Denial offers protection and disruption against opposing spells. Fable of the Mirror-Breaker helps generate additional value. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed, with lands like Flooded Strand and Wooded Foothills providing color fixing. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and powerful creature-based strategy.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on mounting a fast and relentless offensive strategy by utilizing efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, as well as burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to clear the way for attacks. The inclusion of powerful planeswalkers like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah adds versatility and additional firepower to the deck, while cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide card advantage. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly and efficiently, using a combination of creature aggression and burn spells to come out on top in aggressive matchups.

This deck focuses on using the interactions between Broodscale Bloodchief and various cards like Glaring Fleshraker, Malevolent Rumble, and Blade of the Bloodchief to create a powerful combo that can quickly overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Emrakul, the Promised End and Sephiroth, Fabled SOLDIER for added versatility and control. By utilizing these cards in combination with Eldrazi Temple and Urza's Saga, the deck aims to control the board and generate significant advantage to secure victory.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a strong Eldrazi creature presence. By utilizing cards like Chalice of the Void to disrupt the opponent's strategy and Eldrazi Linebreaker to apply pressure early on, the deck aims to close out the game swiftly. With a mix of powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Sire of Seven Deaths, as well as support cards like Kozilek's Command and Wastescape Battlemage, this deck aims to control the board and beat down the opponent efficiently.

The main focus of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent with fast and efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, while using cheap spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to control the board and clear the way for attacks. The deck also emphasizes card selection and card advantage with cards like Expressive Iteration and Preordain. The goal is to win the game quickly by overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells.

The deck aims to disrupt opponents' game plans while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. It utilizes various removal spells like Solitude and Fatal Push to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Cards like Thoughtseize and Relic of Progenitus help to disrupt the opponent's hand and graveyard, while Ephemerate and Flickerwisp provide additional value by blinking creatures for extra abilities. The deck combines elements of aggressive creature strategies with disruption to put the opponent on the back foot and secure victories through tempo advantage.

This deck focuses on fast and aggressive gameplay, utilizing a mix of Naya and Grixis colors to support powerful creatures and burn spells. The main strategy is to quickly establish board presence with efficient creatures like Wild Nacatl and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, while also using Leyline Binding to disrupt opponents' strategies. Tribal Flames and Scion of Draco provide additional reach and finishing power, while Leyline of the Guildpact helps to ensure the deck can consistently cast its spells. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of early aggression and direct damage.

The deck focuses on disrupting and controlling the opponent's resources through a combination of discard spells, removal spells, and land destruction. It also aims to generate card advantage and ramp up towards powerful finishers like Torment of Hailfire and Valgavoth's Onslaught. The inclusion of a companion, Umori, the Collector, provides additional consistency to the deck by allowing only creature spells to be cast. The mana base is focused on generating black mana, with cards like Cabal Coffers and Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth to maximize resources for big plays.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly build up a board presence with aggressive creatures and efficient spells to overwhelm the opponent. The deck utilizes a combination of powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Scion of Draco alongside reactive spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial to control the pace of the game. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding help to protect and support the creatures on the battlefield, while cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Consign to Memory provide additional versatility and card advantage.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays using a mix of creatures with high power and low mana cost to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It also utilizes spells and enchantments to control the board and protect its own creatures. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure the deck can consistently play its powerful threats on curve. The strategy is to apply constant pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan, ultimately leading to a quick victory.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures and using various spells to control the board while dealing damage to the opponent. The key strategy revolves around utilizing cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to apply pressure early on, while also having access to removal spells like Dismember and Thraben Charm to deal with threats. The inclusion of Goblin Bombardment and Ocelot Pride provides additional reach and ways to close out games, making this deck a fast-paced and versatile aggro strategy.

This deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan while deploying aggressive creatures to pressure their life total. By using cards like Thoughtseize, Fatal Push, and Solitude to control the board and disrupt their hand, combined with creatures like Boggart Trawler and Emperor of Bones to apply pressure, you aim to outvalue and outmaneuver your opponent. Additionally, cards like Flickerwisp and Ephemerate provide versatility and utility in manipulating the board state to your advantage. With efficient removal and disruptive creatures, this deck aims to overwhelm your opponent and secure victory.
